column4: ok, i just installed edgy (harder than expected..)   but , i have no idea why, i have no sound at all (it was working as always on dapper before )     any idea?
sorry, was looking fora way to showyou the screenshot wel... the command does what it supposed to i guess, but i dont know  what to look for
just whatever card it's using by default... so long as a mic or webcam didn't take the first audio slot
i still dont have sound and not more advanced on my problem :/
what card is listed in alsamixer?
did you do that which !sound mentioned?
yup .. and i changed the default to my SBlive! soundcard
volume levels, speakers plugged  in, etc? ;)
yup, and i was working in dapper a few hours ago..
have you played with the switches in the volume control?
sometimes there's a digital out thing
nope, i didnt touch anything ( i think)
it looks like your default card is the SiS one (probably onboard)..  in sound preferences, is everything set to autodetect, or to your sblive?
